title: W/O Ram
description: Frustrated with the stalled investigation into her husband's murder, a woman searches for the killer on her own, putting herself in grave danger.
actors: Lakshmi Manchu, Aadarsh Balakrishna, Priyadarshi Pullikonda, Samrat Reddy

title: Waar
description: When Pakistani authorities learn of a looming terrorist strike, they ask a retired intelligence officer to counter the attack before it's too late.
actors: Shaan Shahid, Shamoon Abbasi, Ayesha Khan, Meesha Shafi

title: Waarrior Savitri
description: In a modern adaptation of a mythological tale, a devoted wife is willing to do whatever it takes to rescue her husband from the clutches of death.
actors: Niharica Raizada, Rajat Barmecha, Lucy Pinder, Om Puri

title: Waiting
description: While visiting his comatose wife in the hospital, a serene old professor befriends a vibrant young woman whose husband has also fallen into a coma.
actors: Naseeruddin Shah, Kalki Koechlin, Rajat Kapoor, Rajeev Ravindranathan

title: Wake Up Sid
description: A spoiled trust fund brat finds himself stuck in a rut of meaningless late-night parties -- until he meets a significantly older woman and writer.
actors: Ranbir Kapoor, Konkona Sen Sharma, Shruti Bapna, Krutika Bolaki

title: Walking with Wolves
description: This film explores the delicate, symbiotic relationship shared by wild wolves and nomadic herders in the rugged, hilly terrain of southern India.
actors: Joseph Raja K.

title: Walt Before Mickey
description: This portrait of a young Walt Disney traces his path from Missouri to Hollywood, as he juggles big breaks, raw business deals and a budding romance.
actors: Thomas Ian Nicholas, Jon Heder, Armando Gutierrez, David Henrie

title: Walt Disney Animation Studios Short Films Collection
description: This collection of 12 short films from Disney includes "Frozen Fever," the Mickey Mouse short "Get a Horse!" and Oscar winners "Paperman" and "Feast."
actors: Kristen Bell, Josh Gad, Jonathan Groff, Idina Menzel

title: Walt: The Man Behind the Myth
description: Through exclusive footage and interviews with friends and family, this documentary traces the complicated life of legendary animator Walt Disney.
actors: Dick Van Dyke, Roy Disney, Art Linkletter, Dean Jones

title: Warehoused
description: A soon-to-be-retiring Mr. Lino teaches 20-something Nin the strict rules of his new warehouse job in this dramedy about the absurdities of work life.
actors: José Carlos Ruiz, Hoze Meléndez

title: We Are Family
description: Fed up with being shuffled around, a boy from a big blended family decides that the kids should live in one house and the parents take turns visiting.
actors: Julie Gayet, Thierry Neuvic, Julie Depardieu, Lucien Jean-Baptiste

title: We Are Family
description: A divorced mother of three children runs a happy household -- until her former husband brings his new career-oriented girlfriend into the picture.
actors: Kajol, Kareena Kapoor, Arjun Rampal, Nominath Ginsberg

title: We Are Not Alone
description: After moving to the outskirts of Lima, a family is terrorized by a dark presence in their new home, forcing them to seek the help of an exorcist.
actors: Marco Zunino, Fiorella Díaz, Lucho Cáceres, Zoe Arévalo

title: We Are Young. We Are Strong.
description: In 1992, three radically different residents of Rostock, Germany, become entangled in a violent xenophobic riot that rocks the beleaguered city.
actors: Jonas Nay, Trang Le Hong, Devid Striesow, Joel Basman

title: We Need to Talk
description: A happy woman's new love is going great, but she needs one thing: divorce papers from her depressed ex. To get them, trickery may be in order.
actors: Hugo Silva, Michelle Jenner, Ernesto Sevilla, Belén Cuesta

title: We Own the Night
description: In 1980s Brooklyn, two brothers struggle to keep each other safe even though one is a cop and the other manages a nightclub for Russian gangsters.
actors: Joaquin Phoenix, Mark Wahlberg, Eva Mendes, Robert Duvall

title: We're Back! A Dinosaur's Story
description: Scientist Captain Neweyes time travels to the age of the dinosaurs, where he transforms Rex and his pals from hungry predators to charming beasts.
actors: Walter Cronkite, John Goodman, Blaze Berdahl, Rhea Perlman

title: We're No Animals
description: Unhappy with his commercial film work, a jaded Hollywood actor moves to Argentina to participate in an experimental thesis on social philosophy.
actors: John Cusack, Paul Hipp, Kevin Morris, Alejandro Agresti

title: We, the Marines
description: Narrated by actor and former Marine Gene Hackman, this documentary showcases the experience of becoming a member of the US Marine Corps.
actors: Gene Hackman

title: Wedding Unplanned
description: Mathias's girlfriend finds a business card for a wedding planner in his pocket. Suddenly, he's engaged and hiring his lover to plan the big day!
actors: Reem Kherici, Nicolas Duvauchelle, Julia Piaton, Sylvie Testud

title: Weeds on Fire
description: In 1980s Hong Kong, a school principal forms a baseball team with an eclectic crew of local students who soon fight their way to the top of the league.
actors: Liu Kai Chi, Lam Yiu-sing, Tony Tsz-Tung Wu, Poon Chan-leung

title: Welcome 2 Karachi
description: Denied a U.S. visa, two dim Indian men decide to sneak into America on a boat. Fate, however, leaves them stranded on a beach -- in Karachi, Pakistan.
actors: Arshad Warsi, Jacky Bhagnani, Lauren Gottlieb, Dalip Tahil

title: Welcome Mr. President!
description: When frustrated politicians name a historical figure as the next president, an honest, humble man by the same name suddenly becomes Italy's leader.
actors: Claudio Bisio, Kasia Smutniak, Beppe Fiorello, Remo Girone

title: Welcome to Monster High: The Origin Story
description: Dracula's daughter Draculaura sets out to create a new kind of school where monsters of all kinds can be themselves and have a scary good time.
actors: Debi Derryberry, Cassandra Morris, Salli Saffioti, Larissa Gallagher

title: Welcome to New York
description: A lecherous World Bank official sees his reputation crumbling when he's accused of raping a hotel maid during a trip to New York.
actors: Gérard Depardieu, Jacqueline Bisset, Marie Mouté, Paul Calderon

title: Welcome to Sajjanpur
description: An educated man assists the illiterate residents of his village with written correspondence, sometimes manipulating the letters to suit his interests.
actors: Shreyas Talpade, Amrita Rao, Ravi Kishan, Ila Arun

title: Welcome to Willits
description: A marijuana farmer's extraterrestrial paranoia creates trouble for a group of young campers who pitch their tent on his land in Northern California.
actors: Bill Sage, Sabina Gadecki, Anastasia Baranova, Dolph Lundgren

title: West Coast
description: Four small-town French teens who style themselves after American rappers set out to avenge a classroom insult and end up on a mind-blowing adventure.
actors: Devi Couzigou, Mathis Crusson, Victor Le Blond, Sullivan Loyez

title: What a Wonderful Family!
description: In a large family living under one roof, a storm brews when the matriarch requests a divorce from her husband on their 50th anniversary.
actors: Huang Lei, Sun Li, Lee Li-Chun, Zhang Weixin

title: What the Fish
description: A crabby woman leaves home for a vacation and entrusts her niece's fiancé to feed her fish and adhere to a strict set of rules. He has other ideas.
actors: Dimple Kapadia, Vishal Sharma, Sumit Suri, Anand Tiwari

title: What the Jatt!!
description: A peasant from Punjab and his best friend pose as detectives, filmmakers and more while trying to retrieve stolen money in this romantic comedy.
actors: Harish Verma, Isha Rikhi, Vipul Roy, Poonam Rajput

title: What's Your Raashee?
description: To protect his family from ruin, Yogesh must marry his dream girl in only ten days, so he rushes into dating women with different astrological signs.
actors: Priyanka Chopra, Harman Baweja, Suzy Brack, Gene Fojtik

title: Whatever Works
description: While falling for a Southern belle, an aging eccentric finds himself in a series of strange situations involving the girl's parents and his own pals.
actors: Larry David, Evan Rachel Wood, Patricia Clarkson, Ed Begley Jr.

title: Wheelman
description: The getaway driver in a botched robbery puts his skills and smarts to the test when he receives shocking orders from an unknown caller.
actors: Frank Grillo, Caitlin Carmichael, Garret Dillahunt, Shea Whigham

title: When Animals Dream
description: When 16-year-old Marie breaks out in strange rashes, her small-town neighbors panic and her family's terrifying secret can no longer be contained.
actors: Sonia Suhl, Lars Mikkelsen, Sonja Richter, Jakob Oftebro

title: When Hari Got Married
description: A small-town taxi driver is arranged to be married, resulting in an intimate look at the clash between modernity and tradition in India.

title: When Love Comes Around
description: Much to her distress, a woman who’s long put her guard up by dating men only for their money suddenly finds herself falling in love for real.
actors: Edward Kufuor, Mikki Osei Berko, Jim Iyke, Zynnell Zuh

title: When Love Happens
description: Fed up with coordinating weddings for everyone else, unlucky-in-love event planner Mo turns to the internet to see if she can find her own Mr. Right.
actors: Weruche Opia, Gideon Okeke, Beverly Naya, O.C. Ukeje

title: When Two Worlds Collide
description: This documentary takes a hard look at how indigenous peoples clashed violently with the Peruvian government over land and economics in the Amazon.

title: When We First Met
description: Using a magical photo booth that sends him back in time, Noah relives the night he met Avery over and over, trying to persuade her to fall for him.
actors: Adam DeVine, Alexandra Daddario, Shelley Hennig, Robbie Amell

title: While We're Young
description: A documentary filmmaker struggling with a creative block meets a vibrant young hipster couple who, initially, bring new energy into his life and work.
actors: Ben Stiller, Naomi Watts, Adam Driver, Amanda Seyfried

title: White Christmas
description: Two war buddies fall for two sisters and follow the girls to a resort owned by their former commanding officer, who is in danger of losing the place.
actors: Bing Crosby, Danny Kaye, Rosemary Clooney, Vera-Ellen

title: White Fang
description: A loyal wolfdog's curiosity leads him on the adventure of a lifetime while serving a series of three distinctly different masters.
actors: Nick Offerman, Rashida Jones, Paul Giamatti, Eddie Spears

title: White Girl
description: A college girl romping through New York City in search of cocaine and other highs finds something real to grasp, only to see it potentially slip away.
actors: Morgan Saylor, Brian 'Sene' Marc, Justin Bartha, Chris Noth

title: White Island
description: Returning to Ibiza after several years walking the straight and narrow in London, Connor falls back in with a criminal crowd. It's like he never left.
actors: Lyndon Ogbourne, Billy Zane, Billy Boyd, Joel Dommett

title: Who Gets the Dog?
description: When they can't agree on custody of their beloved dog Wesley, a divorcing couple go to court while battling each other for the pooch's affections.
actors: Alicia Silverstone, Ryan Kwanten, Randall Batinkoff, Matty Ryan

title: Who the F**k Is That Guy?
description: Take a ride through the life of record exec Michael Alago, a gay Puerto Rican New Yorker who signed a slew of musical acts, including Metallica.
actors: Michael Alago

title: Who's Gonna Love Me Now?
description: A gay London man faces a positive HIV diagnosis and a decision on whether to stay with loving friends or return to his estranged parents in Israel.

title: Widows
description: When her husband dies suddenly of a heart attack, Elena, a documentary filmmaker, forms an unlikely bond with his much younger, suicidal mistress.
actors: Graciela Borges, Valeria Bertuccelli, Rita Cortese, Martín Bossi

title: Will to Love
description: A carefree bachelor's life is upended when he learns that he must tie the knot before his grandfather dies in order to inherit the family fortune.
actors: Marques Houston, Keshia Knight Pulliam, Draya Michele, Black Thomas

title: Williams
description: This inspiring documentary charts the birth of Sir Frank Williams's renowned racing empire -- and the near-fatal crash that nearly stalled its future.

title: Win It All
description: After losing $50,000 that wasn't his, gambling addict Eddie starts to rebuild his life. But an unwelcome surprise pushes him toward his old ways.
actors: Jake Johnson, Aislinn Derbez, Joe Lo Truglio, Keegan-Michael Key

title: Wind River
description: A tracker with the U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service assists a rookie FBI agent who's investigating a teen girl's murder on a remote Wyoming reservation.
actors: Jeremy Renner, Elizabeth Olsen, Jon Bernthal, Gil Birmingham

title: Winnie
description: Winnie Mandela speaks about her extraordinary and controversial career, from her early life to her marriage to her ongoing efforts to end apartheid.

title: Winning
description: Examine the iconic careers and winning ways of Martina Navratilova, Jack Nicklaus, Nadia Comaneci, Edwin Moses and Esther Vergeer.
actors: Jack Nicklaus, Martina Navratilova, Nadia Comaneci, Esther Vergeer

title: Winter on Fire: Ukraine's Fight for Freedom
description: Over 93 days in Ukraine, what started as peaceful student demonstrations became a violent revolution and full-fledged civil rights movement.

title: Wish I Was Here
description: With his acting career moribund, Aidan Bloom steers a new tack in life, taking over his children's education when private school becomes too costly.
actors: Zach Braff, Kate Hudson, Donald Faison, Joey King

title: Withdrawn
description: Unable to pay bills and unwilling to change his slacker lifestyle, twentysomething Aaron hatches a defrauding scheme when he finds a lost credit card.
actors: Aaron Keogh, Molly Reisman, Dean Tardioli, Greg Wasylyszn

title: Woman in Gold
description: Six decades after the Holocaust, Maria Altmann embarks on a quest to reclaim her family's Nazi-stolen artwork, including a famed Gustav Klimt piece.
actors: Helen Mirren, Ryan Reynolds, Katie Holmes, Daniel Brühl

title: Women at War 1914-1918
description: Trace the overlapping journeys of exceptional women swept up in World War I and hear their tales of bravery on history's front lines.
actors: Nathalie Baye

title: Women at War 1939-1945
description: Mothers, nurses, soldiers and deportees -- these women fought against persecution for freedom and survival amid the turbulence of World War II.

title: Woody Woodpecker
description: A rascally bird with a distinctive laugh pecks back with a vengeance when his forest habitat is threatened by a slick lawyer building his dream home.
actors: Timothy Omundson, Thaila Ayala, Eric Bauza, Graham Verchere

title: Would You Rather
description: In need of cash to help her sick brother, a young woman agrees to take part in a lethal winner-takes-all parlor game hosted by a sadistic millionaire.
actors: Brittany Snow, Jeffrey Combs, Jonny Coyne, Lawrence Gilliard Jr.

title: Wrong No.
description: Two identical strangers pursue their respective dreams after exchanging lives and getting out from under the thumb of their controlling loved ones.
actors: Javed Sheikh, Danish Taimoor, Janita Asma, Nayyar Ejaz

title: Wrong Side Raju
description: The life of a chauffeur and part-time bootlegger takes a turn toward the dramatic when a girl approaches him to buy illicit alcohol.
actors: Pratik Gandhi, Kimberley Louisa McBeath, Asif Basra, Kavi Shastri
